job_description:
• Experience with Cadence tools (Concept Capture, Allegro PCB).
• Experience with power delivery for GPUs/CPUs is a plus.
• Hands-on experience with hardware lab tools (oscilloscopes, digital analyzers, etc.
• Experience with scripting languages (Python, BASH, Perl) to support design automation and daily tasks.
• Strong teamwork, communication, and organizational skills.
• Experience with high-speed serial interfaces (PCIe, USB) is a plus.
• Background in switch, CPU, and FPGA board design with SI/PI knowledge, particularly Broadcom or Cisco switches.
• Drive the physical design of multilevel boards, including DFM (Design for Manufacturing), power regulation, board bring-up, debug, and qualification.
